remarks: Equivalence of two versions of the Axiom of Choice ~ ax-ac .  The proof uses the Axiom of Regularity.  The right-hand side expresses our AC with the fewest number of different variables.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-May-2015.)
statement:
dfac1 $p |- ( CHOICE <-> A. x E. y A. z A. w ( ( z e. w /\ w e. x ) -> E. x A. z ( E. x ( ( z e. w /\ w e. x ) /\ ( z e. x /\ x e. y ) ) <-> z = x ) ) ) $.
$d w x y z $.
